data.name: Goddess Of Card War 2 DLC-2
data.detailed_description:
A new card character can be purchased in the shop: Manli
Skill: Eliminate
Deal 1.5 times damage to a single enemy. If the enemy's HP is lower than 30%, kill it directly.

  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
